column1: # This file defines the schema for collecting all experiment results for the paper
# Each row corresponds to one experiment block (e.g.
# R_raw: Modal probability mass of byte-identical outputs (baseline)
# R_anchor_pre: Probability mass with distance d=0 to canon (before repair)
# R_anchor_post: Probability mass with distance d=0 to canon (after repair)
# Delta_rescue: Improvement in exact canon matches (R_anchor_post - R_anchor_pre)
# R_repair@k: Probability mass within distance â‰¤ k (tolerance-based repeatability)
# Mean and standard deviation of distances to canon (pre vs post)
# Delta_mu: Reduction in mean distance (mean_pre - mean_post)
# Delta_P_tau: Difference in probability mass within thresholds
# canon_coverage: Fraction of runs producing oracle-passing outputs
# rescue_rate: Fraction of non-canonical outputs successfully repaired
# sweep_id: Identifier for temperature sweep experiments
